casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Michael E. VERRETT. No. 633P05-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 25, 2007. Michael E. Verrett, Pro Se. Isaac T. Avery, III, Special Deputy Attorney General, Locke Bell, District Attorney, for State of NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 27th day of December 2006 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the Superior Court, Gaston County, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court of that County:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 25th day of January 2007."
